DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety tolerability ascend single SC IV dose ATN-103 healthy Japanese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Single Dose Of ATN-103 Administered To Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male subject age 20 45 health determine study investigator . BMI range 17.6 26.4 . Nonsmoker male smoke fewer 10 cigarette per day . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . Acute disease state ( eg , nausea , vomit , infection , fever , diarrhea ) within 7 day study day 1 .
